name: DELL BSAFE Micro Edition Suite越界写入漏洞
description: DELL BSAFE Micro Edition Suite是一款由戴尔公司开发的加密开发工具包。DELL BSAFE Micro Edition Suite存在越界写入漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致拒绝服务。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://www.dell.com/support/kbdoc/en-us/000256131/dsa-2024-459-dell-bsafe-micro-edition-suite-security-update
patch: DELL BSAFE Micro Edition Suite越界写入漏洞的补丁
